{{warning}} This service is still a work in progress. {{/warning}}
You'll find the latests sports scores on this Wiki. This Wiki has been created to work with the [[Mycroft Sports Skill>>url:https://github.com/ldubost/sports-skill]] by extracting sports scores from the great Wikipedia.
This would not be possible without the amazing Wikipedia community who is updating Wikipedia pages very quickly as games are finished. Kudos to Wikipedia.
(% class="wikigeneratedid" %) == Recent Competitions ==
* Wimbledon Tennis * Tour de France races * Paris Saint-Germain Games
== Other sports results supported ==
* [[Tennis>>Sports.Tennis]]: currently Roland Garros & Wimbledon Men & Women * [[Volley-Ball>>Sports.Volley-Ball]]: currently only the Volley Ball Nations League Men * [[Football>>Sports.Football]]: Women Football World Cup 2019, Copa America, African Nations Cup, Paris Saint Germain * [[Rugby>>Sports.Rugby]]: Top 14 * [[Cycling>>Sports.Cycling]]: Tour de France
== Query Sports Results ==
You can try the following queries:
* nadal for Roland Garros or Wimbledon Men * halep for Roland Garros or Wimbledon Women * france for Volley-Ball, Football Worldcup * brazil for Copa America
